name: Jan's Loaded Pizza Fries
author: What's for dinner, mom?
summary: Fries with pizza toppings - just like the pizza place makes! Great snack or lunchtime treat. You can make this like you would your favorite pizza - add any toppings you like. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 ½ cups pizza sauce, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spread fries onto a baking sheet and coat with cooking spray
Bake in the preheated oven until crispy, 35 to 40 minutes
Mix pizza sauce and oregano together in a bowl; pour over fries
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over sauce mixture and top with pepperoni slices
Sprinkle parsley over sauce and pepperoni
Broil fries until cheese is browned and bubbling, 2 to 4 minutes
